div.p: MR. SPOCK, WE SEEM TO BE
I'VE HAD 500 OF THEM MADE UP
SO I HAD TO PROMISE THEM
WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN UP TO?
- YOU ARE FREE TO VISIT THEM.
- YOU ARE FREE TO VISIT THEM.
WELL, I COULD SPEND THE REST
I DO SO ADMIRE A MAN
AYE, SIR, AND I STAYED UNTIL
OH, DIDN'T I TELL YOU, KIRK?
FOR THE PAST COUPLE OF HOURS.
I HAVE A SHIP OF MY OWN,
AND IT'S AS FAST AS ANY
IS NOT A WANT OR A DESIRE.
BUT IT'S BEEN A REAL PLEASURE
WHATEVER METHOD WE USE TO STOP
HE SHOULD BE IN A BIND
- ONLY THIS WAY CAN WE BE HAPPY.
- ONLY THIS WAY CAN WE BE HAPPY.
WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN UP TO?
